Description: User explicitly denies MFA push, indicating that login was not expected and the account's password may be compromised.
Name: 8e083ebf-b132-4c0d-bb82-a6fe6ad28dd9
Query:
let threshold = 1;
let FailedMFASignins = SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) // CAN BE 1 DAY DEP. ON TENANT
    | where ResultType == 500121
    | where Status has "MFA Denied; user declined the authentication"
        or Status has "MFA denied; Phone App Reported Fraud"
        or Status has "MFA denied; user did not select the correct number"
        or Status has "MFA denied; user did not respond to mobile app notification"
    | extend isManaged = tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).isManaged)
    | extend isJoined = tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).trustType)
    | extend isRegistered = tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).trustType)
    | project
        TimeGenerated,
        ResultType,
        ResultDescription,
        Identity,
        IPAddress,
        Status,
        AppDisplayName,
        isManaged,
        isJoined,
        isRegistered
    | summarize 
        MFAFailedCount=count(),
        ErrorStatus = make_set(Status),
        FailedAppsList = make_set(AppDisplayName)
        by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Identity, IPAddress, isManaged, isJoined, isRegistered // CAN BE 1 DAY DEP. ON TENANT
    | where MFAFailedCount > threshold;
let OldestSuccessfulSignin = SigninLogs
    | where ResultType == 0
    | join kind= inner (FailedMFASignins) on IPAddress
    | summarize OldestSigninfrom5days = min(TimeGenerated) by IPAddress;
let SuccessfulMFASignins = SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) // CAN BE 1 DAY DEP. ON TENANT
    | where ResultType != 500121 // Assuming non-500121 result type is a successful MFA
    | extend isJoined = tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).trustType)
    | extend isRegistered = tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).trustType)
    | project TimeGenerated, ResultType, Identity, IPAddress, isJoined, isRegistered
    | summarize SuccessfulMFACount=count() by Identity, IPAddress, isJoined, isRegistered;
let SameIPUsersSignins = SigninLogs
    | join kind=inner (FailedMFASignins) on IPAddress
    | where not(Identity contains "-")
    | distinct Identity, IPAddress
    | summarize SameIPUsers5DaysCount = count() by IPAddress
    | project IPAddress, SameIPUsers5DaysCount;
let SameIPSuccessfulSignins5Days = SigninLogs
    | where ResultType == 0
    | summarize IPSuccessfulSignins5DaysCount = count() by IPAddress;
let JoinedAttempt = SigninLogs
    | where tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).trustType) contains "Joined"
    | extend JoinedAttempt = tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).trustType)
    | summarize IPJoinedAttempts5DaysCount = count() by IPAddress;
let RegistereddAttempt = SigninLogs
    | where tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).trustType) contains "Registered"
    | extend RegisteredAttempt = tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail).trustType)
    | summarize IPRegisteredAttempts5DaysCount = count() by IPAddress;
let ManagedAttempts = SigninLogs
| union AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where (tostring( parse_json(DeviceDetail_dynamic).trustType) != "" or tostring( parse_json(DeviceDetail_string).trustType) != "") or (DeviceDetail_dynamic or DeviceDetail_string contains "PII Removed")
| distinct IPAddress;
FailedMFASignins
| join kind=inner (SuccessfulMFASignins) on Identity, IPAddress, isJoined, isRegistered
| extend ManagedDevice = iif(isManaged == "true", "Managed", "Unmanaged")
| extend JoinedDevice = iif(isJoined contains "Azure AD joined", "Joined", "Not Joined")
| extend RegisteredDevice = iif(isRegistered contains "Registered", "Registered", "Not Registered")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Identity,
    IPAddress,
    MFAFailedCount,
    FailedAppsList,
    ErrorStatus,
    SuccessfulMFACount,
    ManagedDevice,
    JoinedDevice,
    RegisteredDevice
| join kind=leftouter (SameIPUsersSignins) on IPAddress
| extend SameIPUsers5DaysCount = coalesce(SameIPUsers5DaysCount, 0)
| join kind= leftouter (SameIPSuccessfulSignins5Days) on $left.IPAddress == $right.IPAddress
| extend IPSuccessfulSignins5DaysCount = coalesce(IPSuccessfulSignins5DaysCount, 0)
| join kind=leftouter (RegistereddAttempt) on $left.IPAddress == $right.IPAddress
| extend IPRegisteredAttempts5DaysCount = coalesce(IPRegisteredAttempts5DaysCount, 0)
| join kind=leftouter  (JoinedAttempt) on $left.IPAddress == $right.IPAddress
| extend IPJoinedAttempts5DaysCount= coalesce(IPJoinedAttempts5DaysCount, 0)
| join kind=leftouter OldestSuccessfulSignin on IPAddress
| project 
    TimeGenerated,
    Identity,
    IPAddress,
    MFAFailedCount,
    FailedAppsList,
    ErrorStatus,
    SuccessfulMFACount,
    SameIPUsers5DaysCount,
    IPSuccessfulSignins5DaysCount,
    OldestSigninfrom5days,
    IPJoinedAttempts5DaysCount,
    IPRegisteredAttempts5DaysCount,
    ManagedDevice,
    JoinedDevice,
    RegisteredDevice
| where IPSuccessfulSignins5DaysCount == 0 or (IPJoinedAttempts5DaysCount == 0 and IPRegisteredAttempts5DaysCount == 0)
| join kind=leftanti ManagedAttempts on IPAddress
